creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: oblong woven bamboo basket with cylindrical solid bamboo insert; basket has ring of bamboo at top and a small, semi-circle wrapped handle on one side; three-quarters of the way down that body of the basket narrows and two strips of bamboo are wrapped and intricately tied around the indentation; below this cinched area the basket ends in a bulbous form
signed: Signature in Japanese carved into piece of bamboo, which is inserted into basket weave on underside.
title: Basket
